casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gyrell Shavonta LEE 335PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 18, 2017 Paul M. Green, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Lee, Gyrell Shavonta. Kimberly D. Potter, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Womble, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Camden R. Webb, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cato Institute.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of May 2017 by Amicus Ilya Shapiro for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of May 2017."
